original_title: Cicada: I Was a Teenage Horror Movie!
overview: In 1997, tweens with a VHS camera filmed a horror epic. 25 years later, they edited itâ€”as a comedy. Soak in the gloriously glitchy VHS splendor of this remixed horror-comedy that is at once a bloody twist on vampire lore and an endearing portrait of filmmakers coming of "rage."
title: Cicada: I Was a Teenage Horror Movie!
